Topic.Title: ...cont' from the ETROT (there is no God)

Posts.EditableText:
[quote:1xqn3cry]ps, where have you been bro?[/quote:1xqn3cry]

Well, I've been busy with school, work, and family.  I've got my 2 hours back every morning for "me-time", so I cracked open Quest again.  Working on a little library that I hope to get done soon, and a 'short story' game:  no more mega-RPG's for me.  Faeguard has become actual fiction, so I won't be working on that anymore.

How about you?  What's been going on around here?  Have I missed much?
